subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of sections 8 and 14, a toy or children’s product can be placed into the mouth of a child under 4 years of age if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: each dimension of the toy or product is less than 5 cm; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the toy or product can, in a reasonably foreseeable manner, be brought to the mouth of such a child and kept in the mouth so that the toy or product can be sucked or chewed.

subsection.leadIn: For the purposes of sections 9 and 15, a part of a toy or children’s product can be placed into the mouth of a child under 4 years of age if—

paragraph.name: a

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the part can, in a reasonably foreseeable manner, be brought to the mouth of such a child and kept in the mouth so that the part can be sucked or chewed.

subsection.content: For the purposes of subsections (2) and (3), if a toy, children’s product, or part of a toy or children’s product is inflatable, the toy, product or part is to be considered in its deflated state.

section.name: s4
section.heading: Additional safety standards or requirements for toys and children’s products

subsection.content: The additional safety standards or requirements for toys are set out in Part 2.
The additional safety standards or requirements for children’s products are set out in Part 3.

part.name: P2
part.heading: Additional Safety Standards or Requirements for Toys

subsection.leadIn: The information set out in subsection (2) must be legibly marked, in the English or Chinese language, or both, in a conspicuous position on—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: a toy;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the packaging of a toy;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: a label securely affixed to a toy or the packaging of a toy; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: a document enclosed in the packaging of a toy.

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the full name or trade mark of the manufacturer, importer or supplier of the toy (connected person), or any other mark of the connected person that enables the person to be identified; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the address in Hong Kong of the connected person.

subsection.content: If the connected person is a company, the address mentioned in subsection (2)(b) is the address of the registered office in Hong Kong of the company.

subsection.leadIn: This section applies if a warning or caution with respect to the safe keeping, use, consumption or disposal of a toy (safety warning)—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: is marked on the toy;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: is marked on the packaging of the toy;

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: is contained in a label affixed to the toy or the packaging of the toy; or

paragraph.name: d
paragraph.content: is contained in a document enclosed in the packaging of the toy.

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: must be legible; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: must be in both the English and Chinese languages.

subsection.content: If the safety warning is marked on a toy, the warning must be in a conspicuous position on the toy.
If the safety warning is marked on the packaging of a toy, the warning must be in a conspicuous position on the packaging.

subsection.leadIn: If the safety warning is contained in a label affixed to a toy or the packaging of a toy—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the warning must be in a conspicuous position on the label; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the label must be securely affixed to the toy or the packaging.

subsection.content: If the safety warning is contained in a document enclosed in the packaging of a toy, the warning must be in a conspicuous position on the document.

section.name: s7
section.heading: Concentration of Class 1 phthalates in toys

subsection.content: This section applies to a toy that contains any Class 1 phthalate.
The total weight of the Class 1 phthalates in a toy must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in the toy.
In determining the total weight of the Class 1 phthalates or the plasticized materials in a toy, a component part of the toy that is inaccessible is not to be taken into account.
For the purposes of subsection (3), a component part of a toy is inaccessible if the component part cannot come into contact with a child through reasonably foreseeable use of the toy.

section.name: s8
section.heading: Toys capable of being entirely placed into mouth of child under 4 years of age

subsection.leadIn: This section applies to a toy if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: the toy can be placed into the mouth of a child under 4 years of age; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the toy contains any Class 2 phthalate.

subsection.content: The total weight of the Class 2 phthalates in a toy must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in the toy.
In determining the total weight of the Class 2 phthalates or the plasticized materials in a toy, a component part of the toy that is inaccessible is not to be taken into account.

For the purposes of subsection (3), a component part of a toy is inaccessible if the component part cannot come into contact with the mouth of a child under 4 years of age through reasonably foreseeable use of the toy.

section.name: s9
section.heading: Toys capable of being partly placed into mouth of child under 4 years of age

subsection.leadIn: This section applies to a toy if—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: only one part of the toy can be placed into the mouth of a child under 4 years of age, and that part contains any Class 2 phthalate; or

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: more than one part of the toy can be placed into the mouth of a child under 4 years of age, and all or any of those parts contains any Class 2 phthalate.

subsection.content: For a toy falling within the description in subsection (1)(a), the total weight of the Class 2 phthalates in the part mentioned in that subsection must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in that part.

For a toy falling within the description in subsection (1)(b), the total weight of the Class 2 phthalates in those parts mentioned in that subsection must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in those parts.

In determining the total weight of the Class 2 phthalates or the plasticized materials in one or more than one part of a toy, a component part of the toy that is inaccessible is not to be taken into account.

For the purposes of subsection (4), a component part of a toy is inaccessible if the component part cannot come into contact with the mouth of a child under 4 years of age through reasonably foreseeable use of the toy.

division.name: D2
division.heading: Concentration of Phthalates in Children’s Products

section.name: s12
section.heading: Application of Division 2 of Part 3
section.content: This Division applies to a children’s product that is intended to facilitate the feeding, hygiene, relaxation, sleep, sucking or teething of a child under 4 years of age, and that contains any plasticized material.

section.name: s13
section.heading: Concentration of Class 1 phthalates in children’s products

subsection.content: This section applies to a children’s product that contains any Class 1 phthalate.
The total weight of the Class 1 phthalates in a children’s product must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in the product.
In determining the total weight of the Class 1 phthalates or the plasticized materials in a children’s product, a component part of the product that is inaccessible is not to be taken into account.

For the purposes of subsection (3), a component part of a children’s product is inaccessible if the component part cannot come into contact with a child under 4 years of age through reasonably foreseeable use of the product.

section.name: s14
section.heading: Children’s products capable of being entirely placed into mouth of child under 4 years of age

subsection.leadIn: This section applies to a children’s product if—

paragraph.name: a

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: the product contains any Class 2 phthalate.

subsection.content: The total weight of the Class 2 phthalates in a children’s product must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in the product.
In determining the total weight of the Class 2 phthalates or the plasticized materials in a children’s product, a component part of the product that is inaccessible is not to be taken into account.

For the purposes of subsection (3), a component part of a children’s product is inaccessible if the component part cannot come into contact with the mouth of a child under 4 years of age through reasonably foreseeable use of the product.

subsection.content: For a children’s product falling within the description in subsection (1)(a), the total weight of the Class 2 phthalates in the part mentioned in that subsection must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in that part.

For a children’s product falling within the description in subsection (1)(b), the total weight of the Class 2 phthalates in those parts mentioned in that subsection must not exceed 0.1% of the total weight of the plasticized materials in those parts.
